name: charsetDecode
description: Converts a string to a binary representation.

params.name: string
params.description: A string containing data to encode in binary format.

params.name: encoding
params.description: A string specifying encoding of the input data.

examples.title: Decode a string using utf-8 back into binary encoding of the string
examples.description: Use charsetDecode to decode with utf-8

examples.title: Decode a string using us-ascii back into binary encoding of the string
examples.description: Use charsetDecode to decode with us-ascii
